name: Weather dashbord
description: This is a weather dashboard with form inputs that enables traveler to see the weather outlook for multiple cities so that they can plan a trip accordingly

name: Work Day Scheduler
description: A simple calendar application that allows a user to save events for each hour of the day by modifying starter code

name: Countries Quiz
description: The 'Countries Quiz' is an engaging and educational quiz game that challenges players with questions about various countries and their capitals.

name: Beloved Recipes
description: This app offers a collection of delicious recipes and plenty of culinary inspiration

name: Password generator
description: Password Generator is an application that generate a random password based on selected criteria.

name: Movie Finder
description: The application that allow an user to find the movie they like
